topDeals.name: 1500 Live Ladybugs
topDeals.description: 1500 Live Ladybugs, Live Delivery Guaranteed!!Includes a Ladybug educational sheet with Fun Facts and FAQ's. Ladybugs are general predators that feed on a variety of slow-moving insects. Great for kids, birthday parties, and school projects!

topDeals.name: Cat Butt Tissue Holder
topDeals.description: Black & white tuxedo cat tissue paper dispenser, fits standard square tissue box, made of resin

topDeals.name: Dill Pickle Lip Balm
topDeals.description: This standard size pickle lip balm comes in a green 4.5g tube which features a happy pickle suggesting you “pucker up!”. Made in the USA – Encouraging dill pickle kisses everywhere

topDeals.name: Dog Wig
topDeals.description: Rubie's Costume Company Pet Wig with a high ponytail, fits most small/medium dogs. Perfect for your sassy companion! Could also fit on bigger cats!

topDeals.name: The Gift of Nothing
topDeals.description: What do you get for the person who has everything? Nothing—literally. But unlike the traditional nothing, this one will cost you almost $7!
